A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some fans will hate this movie because it challenges the way we used to think about Star Wars. It’s new and it’s refreshing. People complain the plot was muddled and has holes\, name a single Star Wars movie that hasn’t had a few plot holes. This movie was great because it is original and unique. J J Abrams is a crowd pleaser. Rian Johnson is a filmmaker. However I do believe J.J. will make a perfect spectacle to conclude the series.
